Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your high standards. This product holds immense value to us, but considering its worth to you, we're confident it's an investment that will pay off handsomely. We're offering this exceptional item to you for $9500, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. We believe this price reflects the quality and utility of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. We look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
